author: Kyle Niewiada
comment: I don't really like the persistent notification...at all. Even when I'm not typing it shows up.  It bugs me enough and gets in the way of my other notifications that I'll probably remove the app.
title: Persistent notification.

author: Aaron Mawby
comment: I should be able to schedule when it should be active or turn it on our off. When I'm driving it's constantly telling me to take a break or look out the window.....
title: Great idea but...

author: Francisco Saravia
comment: On my moto 360. It crashes out of the blue.  Not sure why. I look at my watch and twice the app has crashed and not responding.
title: App crashes

author: Dawei Yang
comment: After a restart, the watch keeps vibrating for unlimited notifications and the app page on my phone stuck at the green page and the timer flashes between 3:00 and 2:59

author: Meng Taing
comment: If you have to use keyboard continously for long period of time, must try. It usually reminds me to take break at the correct timing.
title: Work well
